name: cc-time-ago
description: This is a simple NodeJs module that calculates the time elapsed by subtracting the time an entry was made from the current time. It has a good partten of displaying the time like "Just Now", "1 Second ago", "2 minutes ago", "2 hours ago" and so on.
author: Fidelis Fraze Musamba <devfidelisfraze@gmail.com> (https://github.com/DevFidelis)
